Grey Talon: - Improved {{HeroIcon|Hero=Grey Talon|Size=20}} Grey Talon's trap visibility
Infernus: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Afterburn|Size=20}} Afterburn now shows portraits of enemies that are burning for the full duration
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash cooldown increased from 30s to 38s
Vindicta: - Added {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate sound effect for targeted players
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight spirit bonus damage reduced from +12 to +10
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight no longer has +10% bonus range to damage falloff
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight T2 changed from +12 Spirit Damage to -15s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight T3 changed from +3 m/s Bonus Air Speed to +12 Spirit Damage
- Can no longer melee while flying for extra movement
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate now ramps up its total damage from 50% to 100% over 1 second of being zoomed (UI indication for this)
- Fixed being unable to move while scoped in with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate
Kelvin: - Improved visuals for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Kelvin|Size=20}} Kelvin's gun projectile
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path sprint speed increased from +1 to +2
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path trail duration increased from 12s to 15s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter T2 changed to -40s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter T3 changed to +70 {{ItemIcon|Item=Health Regen|Size=20}} Health Regen that scales with Spirit
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter can now be dismissed early
Pocket: - Added AoE effect to {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage
- Updated weapon buff effect in {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak upgrade
- Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's Enchanted Satchel delay and explode sounds
- Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage cast and impact sounds
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage channel can now be interrupted by casting your other abilities
- Enchanted Satchel cast time reduced from 0.25s to 0.15s
Warden: - Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word delay and impact sounds
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask T3 increased from +25% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate Slow to +35%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Willpower|Size=20}} Willpower T3 increased from +150 Spirit Shield to +200
Dynamo: - Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Dynamo|Size=20}} Dynamo's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20}} Quantum Entanglement going through ceilings sometimes
- Base HP growth reduced from 48 to 44
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20}} Quantum Entanglement fire rate bonus reduced from +30% to +25%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20}} Singularity base radius increased from 8m to 10m
Ivy: - Fixed training {{HeroIcon|Hero=Ivy|Size=20}} Ivy's True Form causing you to get healed
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Watcher's Covenant|Size=20}} Watcher's Covenant heal sharing reduced from 65% to 55%
Abrams: - Base HP growth reduced from 36 to 32
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience T2 reduced from +200 Health to +150
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact personal brief busy state upon landing increased from 0.2s to 0.3s
Bebop: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam slow now affects stamina dashes
Haze: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger T3 damage reduction on target improved from -30% to -40%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb sprint speed now instantly kicks in after casting it
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance cooldown reduced from 160s to 130s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance T2 changed to -40s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance T3 changed to +1 Targets Hit Per Shot
McGinnis: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20}} Spectral Wall can now be dismissed early
Seven: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Storm Cloud|Size=20}} Storm Cloud T1 increased from +30% to +35% Bullet Resist

Fire Rate: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate powerup reduced from +20% to +15%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate powerup duration increased from 25s to 35s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask T3 increased from +25% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate Slow to +35%
Health Regen: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Health Regen|Size=20}} Health Regen powerup regen reduced from 1.5% to 1%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Health Regen|Size=20}} Health Regen powerup duration increased from 15s to 25s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter T3 changed to +70 {{ItemIcon|Item=Health Regen|Size=20}} Health Regen that scales with Spirit
Extra Stamina: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Extra Stamina|Size=20}} Extra Stamina powerup duration increased from 60s to 80s
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Extra Stamina|Size=20}} Extra Stamina powerup amount reduced from 2 to 1
Spirit Lifesteal: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Enduring Spirit|Size=20}} Enduring Spirit: {{ItemIcon|Item=Spirit Lifesteal|Size=20}} Spirit Lifesteal reduced from +10% to +8%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Spirit Lifesteal|Size=20}} Spirit Lifesteal reduced from +35% to +33%
Enduring Spirit: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Spirit Lifesteal|Size=20}} Spirit Lifesteal reduced from +10% to +8%
Decay: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Decay|Size=20}} Decay changed from 2.2% of Max Health to 2.4% Current Health (less damage when the target is low, and non-lethal now)
Healbane: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Healbane|Size=20}} Healbane moved from Spirit tree to Vitality tree
Sharpshooter: - Damage falloff bonus reduced from 20% to 15%
Metal Skin: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Metal Skin|Size=20}} Metal Skin duration reduced from 4s to 3s
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Metal Skin|Size=20}} Metal Skin cooldown increased from 25s to 30s
Intensifying Magazine: - Time for Max Damage reduced from 4s to 3.5s
Torment Pulse: - Damage per pulse reduced from 45 to 40 (total dps from 22.5 to 26.6)
Leech: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Spirit Lifesteal|Size=20}} Spirit Lifesteal reduced from +35% to +33%
Mystic Reverb: - Fixed the damage being reduced by armor twice
Smoke: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb sprint speed now instantly kicks in after casting it

Afterburn: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Infernus|Size=20}} Infernus's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Afterburn|Size=20}} Afterburn now shows portraits of enemies that are burning for the full duration
Kinetic Carbine: - Added {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine charge audio loop
Flight: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight spirit bonus damage reduced from +12 to +10
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight no longer has +10% bonus range to damage falloff
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight T2 changed from +12 Spirit Damage to -15s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight T3 changed from +3 m/s Bonus Air Speed to +12 Spirit Damage
Assassinate: - Added {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate sound effect for targeted players
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate now ramps up its total damage from 50% to 100% over 1 second of being zoomed (UI indication for this)
- Fixed being unable to move while scoped in with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate
Ice Path: - Fixed some visual issues with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path sprint speed increased from +1 to +2
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path trail duration increased from 12s to 15s
Barrage: - Added AoE effect to {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage
- Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage cast and impact sounds
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage channel can now be interrupted by casting your other abilities
Flying Cloak: - Updated weapon buff effect in {{HeroIcon|Hero=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak upgrade
Power Slash: - Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20}} Power Slash sometimes getting stuck on nearby geometry
Binding Word: - Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word delay and impact sounds
Quantum Entanglement: - Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Dynamo|Size=20}} Dynamo's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20}} Quantum Entanglement going through ceilings sometimes
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20}} Quantum Entanglement fire rate bonus reduced from +30% to +25%
Malice: - Fixed a bug with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Malice|Size=20}} Malice firing slightly upward
Infernal Resilience: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Infernal Resilience|Size=20}} Infernal Resilience T2 reduced from +200 Health to +150
Seismic Impact: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20}} Seismic Impact personal brief busy state upon landing increased from 0.2s to 0.3s
Hyper Beam: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20}} Hyper Beam slow now affects stamina dashes
Singularity: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20}} Singularity base radius increased from 8m to 10m
Sleep Dagger: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger T3 damage reduction on target improved from -30% to -40%
Smoke Bomb: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb sprint speed now instantly kicks in after casting it
Bullet Dance: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance cooldown reduced from 160s to 130s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance T2 changed to -40s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance T3 changed to +1 Targets Hit Per Shot
Flame Dash: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash cooldown increased from 30s to 38s
Watcher's Covenant: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Watcher's Covenant|Size=20}} Watcher's Covenant heal sharing reduced from 65% to 55%
Frozen Shelter: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter T2 changed to -40s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter T3 changed to +70 {{ItemIcon|Item=Health Regen|Size=20}} Health Regen that scales with Spirit
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter can now be dismissed early
Spectral Wall: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20}} Spectral Wall can now be dismissed early
Storm Cloud: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Storm Cloud|Size=20}} Storm Cloud T1 increased from +30% to +35% Bullet Resist
Alchemical Flask: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask T3 increased from +25% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate Slow to +35%

General: - Reworked how friend invites work inside the client. You must now be Steam friends with a person to invite them. This has a friend recency requirement as well as your friend needing to not be a limited steam user. Previous requests do not need to be resubmitted.
- Replaced the neutral vaults with a new model, the Sinner's Sacrifice
- Added the ability to change builds while in-game
- Build descriptions can now be seen in-game via a tooltip
- Added neutrals to Hero Sandbox (the small room in the back on the right)
- Added new objective health bars for Guardians and Walkers
- Added Match History link to the top right
- You can now move active item slots on the HUD while holding alt/tab
- Improved visibility of the voice icon indicating who is talking
- Hero icons on the minimap are scaled up a little when holding alt
- Removed Pause cooldown in private bot matches and tutorial/sandbox
- Improved networking when there is packet loss or jitter
- Soul Vessel dropped from heroes (after killing neutrals) now scales in size based on how many souls are inside
- Increased the speed of Guardian's melee attacks
- Changed Guardian's behavior to only attempt melee when a unit is within 6m but still do damage to units in 12m range
- Candle trooper health bars now stick around at 1% when they are in self destruct mode to make it more clear they can still be shot
- Improved menu UI sound feedback
- Player's icon is highlighted in the top bar
- Added UI sound effects for team and opponent deaths
- Visual effects updates for melee lifesteal items
- Updated sound effects for the Sinner's Sacrifice
- Fixed an HTML exploit with chat
- Fixed not being able to place deployable abilities at certain angles
- Fixed moving active item slots causing the player to say "[ITEM] is on cooldown"
- Changed collision on barrel stand stacks to block bullets
- Added zapper on factory outpost building
- Removed roof duct on top of low building besides inner Walker
- Removed street lamp post that was causing heroes to get stuck near inner lane Guardian
- Added lights to outer lane Cosmic Veil tunnels
- More heroes will now compliment on good uses of ultimates instead of just saying "good work"
- Fixed more instances of heroes being called out by the wrong name
- Base hero kill value increased from 150 to 225
- Rejuv duration reduced from 4 to 3 minutes
- Rejuv buff no longer increases your ammo
- Rejuv now causes all your candle troopers to have double health for 3 minutes
- Mid Boss can now only be damaged by enemies inside the bottom pit
- Mid Boss Rejuv claim time reduced from 2.5s to 1.5s
- Strong neutrals HP reduced by 20%
- Strong neutrals souls bounty reduced by 20%
- 4 Strong Neutral camps in the corners of the map have been replaced with Medium neutrals
- Vaults souls increased from 260 to 300
- Spirit tier bonus increased from 3/6/9/12 to 4/8/12/16
- Vitality tier bonus increased from 5/10/15/20% to 8/12/16/20%
- Bullet damage falloff now maxes out at ~65m instead of ~70m
- Walker bomb damage reduced from 300 to 200
- Moved the middle lane Base Guardians further out slightly

- Powerups bonus types are now split between the regular destructibles like crates/vases/etc and the Golden Statues. Regular ones can only roll for souls and Golden Statues can only roll for buffs. Distribution of destructibles and Golden Status around the map has been adjusted a bit.
- Respawn rate for Destructibles/Statues (after initial spawn) slowed from 120s to 180s
- Mid boss area has reduced destructibles
- Movement Speed powerup duration increased from 12s to 30s
- Movement Speed powerup movespeed reduced from 2 to 1
- Movement Speed powerup sprint speed increased from 2 to 4
- Cooldown Reduction powerup reduced from 25% to 20%
- Extra Clip powerup reduced from 4 clips to 3
- Crouch movespeed increased from 4 to 4.75
- Bullet Shields now block damage from melee (similar to resistance)
- Increased the distance heroes slide when they come to the bottom of a ramp
- Shifting Shroud: Cooldown reduced from 45s to 35s
- Shifting Shroud: Bonus spirit duration increased from 6s to 10s
- Diviner's Kelvar: Bullet Shield increased from 700 to 1000
